entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is concerned about Ginny's injury. He says 'Ginny?' and asks 'What happened?' (Excerpt: "Ginny?" Harry said fearfully. "What happened?")

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is injured, her ankle is broken. She shakes her head and slides down the wall into a sitting position (Excerpt: But Ginny shook her head and slid down the wall into a sitting po-sition, panting and holding her ankle.)

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is injured, something dark is trickling from the corner of his mouth. He clutches Harry's robes (Excerpt: Ron’s face was very white and some thing dark was trickling from the corner of his mouth.)

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is unhurt, she bends over Ginny to help her (Excerpt: "I think her ankle’s broken, I heard something crack," whispered Luna, who was bending over her and who alone seemed to be unhurt.)

entities.name: uranus
entities.description: Uranus is a planet that Ron and Ginny saw up close (Excerpt: "Harry, we saw Uranus up close!" said Ron, still giggling feebly.)

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Ginny's injury (Excerpt: Harry said fearfully. "What happened?")
Luna is helping Ginny, who has a broken ankle (Excerpt: "I think her ankle’s broken, I heard something crack," whispered Luna, who was bending over her and who alone seemed to be unhurt.)
Ron clutches Harry's robes (Excerpt: Next moment his knees had given way, but he still clutched the front of Harry’s robes, so that Harry was pulled into a kind of bow.)
Ron saw Uranus up close (Excerpt: "Harry, we saw Uranus up close!" said Ron, still giggling feebly.)
